description: Unique identifier for this customization log entry; used to track a specific snapshot of settings applied to an application entity.
Identifier of the parent customization record this log refers to; links the snapshot to its source configuration/version.
Target system entity or module impacted by the customization (e.g., work orders, work requests, assets).
Entity variant or context for the customization, such as view type, portal context, site/business unit, or asset category; meaning may vary by entity and should be confirmed with SMEs.

Serialized configuration payload for the customization at the entity level, likely stored as JSON (layout, behaviors, defaults, rules); structure may vary by entity; confirm format and schema with SMEs.
User account that last modified this log entry or its stored configuration.
Timestamp when the log entry was last updated.
User account that created the log entry.
Timestamp when the log entry was created.
Serialized list of field-level configurations included in this customization (per-column attributes such as visibility, labels, input properties), typically stored as a JSON array.
Free-text description or comment explaining the customization change, purpose, or scope.
